verses.verse: The heavens <S%H8064><s%> and the earth <S%H776><s%> were finished, <S%H3615><s%> and all their vast array. <S%H6635><s%>

On the seventh <S%H7637><s%> day <S%H3117><s%> God <S%H430><s%> finished <S%H3615><s%> his work <S%H4399><s%> which he had made; <S%H6213><s%> and he rested <S%H7673><s%> on the seventh <S%H7637><s%> day <S%H3117><s%> from all his work <S%H4399><s%> which he had made. <S%H6213><s%>

God <S%H430><s%> blessed <S%H1288><s%> the seventh <S%H7637><s%> day, <S%H3117><s%> and made it holy, <S%H6942><s%> because <S%H3588><s%> he rested <S%H7673><s%> in it from all his work <S%H4399><s%> which he <S%H430><s%> had created <S%H1254><s%> and made. <S%H6213><s%>

This is the history of the generations <S%H8435><s%> of the heavens <S%H8064><s%> and of the earth <S%H776><s%> when they were created, <S%H1254><s%> in the day <S%H3117><s%> that Yahweh <S%H3068><s%> God <S%H430><s%> made <S%H6213><s%> the earth <S%H776><s%> and the heavens. <S%H8064><s%>

No plant <S%H7880><s%> of the field <S%H7704><s%> was yet <S%H2962><s%> in the earth, <S%H776><s%> and no herb <S%H6212><s%> of the field <S%H7704><s%> had yet <S%H2962><s%> sprung up; <S%H6779><s%> for <S%H3588><s%> Yahweh <S%H3068><s%> God <S%H430><s%> had not <S%H3808><s%> caused it to rain <S%H4305><s%> on the earth. <S%H776><s%> There was not <S%H369><s%> a man <S%H120><s%> to till <S%H5647><s%> the ground, <S%H127><s%>
but a mist <S%H108><s%> went up <S%H5927><s%> from <S%H4480><s%> the earth, <S%H776><s%> and watered <S%H8248><s%> the whole surface <S%H6440><s%> of the ground. <S%H127><s%>

Yahweh <S%H3068><s%> God <S%H430><s%> formed <S%H3335><s%> man <S%H120><s%> from the dust <S%H6083><s%> of <S%H4480><s%> the ground, <S%H127><s%> and breathed <S%H5301><s%> into his nostrils <S%H639><s%> the breath <S%H5397><s%> of life; <S%H2416><s%> and man <S%H120><s%> became a living <S%H2416><s%> soul. <S%H5315><s%>

Yahweh <S%H3068><s%> God <S%H430><s%> planted <S%H5193><s%> a garden <S%H1588><s%> eastward, <S%H6924><s%> in Eden, <S%H5731><s%> and there <S%H8033><s%> he put <S%H7760><s%> the man <S%H120><s%> whom <S%H834><s%> he had formed. <S%H3335><s%>

Out <S%H4480><s%> of the ground <S%H127><s%> Yahweh <S%H3068><s%> God <S%H430><s%> made <S%H6779><s%> every tree <S%H6086><s%> to grow <S%H6779><s%> that is pleasant <S%H2530><s%> to the sight, <S%H4758><s%> and good <S%H2896><s%> for food; <S%H3978><s%> the tree <S%H6086><s%> of life <S%H2416><s%> also in the middle <S%H8432><s%> of the garden, <S%H1588><s%> and the tree <S%H6086><s%> of the knowledge <S%H1847><s%> of good <S%H2896><s%> and evil. <S%H7451><s%>

A river <S%H5104><s%> went out <S%H3318><s%> of Eden <S%H5731><s%> to water <S%H8248><s%> the garden; <S%H1588><s%> and from there it was parted, <S%H6504><s%> and became four <S%H702><s%> heads. <S%H7218><s%>

The name <S%H8034><s%> of the first <S%H259><s%> is Pishon: <S%H6376><s%> this <S%H1931><s%> is the one which flows <S%H5437><s%> through the whole land <S%H776><s%> of Havilah, <S%H2341><s%> where <S%H834><s%> there is gold; <S%H2091><s%>
and the gold <S%H2091><s%> of that <S%H1931><s%> land <S%H776><s%> is good. <S%H2896><s%> There is aromatic resin <S%H916><s%> and the onyx <S%H7718><s%> stone. <S%H68><s%>
The name <S%H8034><s%> of the second <S%H8145><s%> river <S%H5104><s%> is Gihon: <S%H1521><s%> the same river that flows through <S%H5437><s%> the whole land <S%H776><s%> of Cush. <S%H3568><s%>

The name <S%H8034><s%> of the third <S%H7992><s%> river <S%H5104><s%> is Hiddekel: <S%H2313><s%> this is the one which flows in <S%H1980><s%> front <S%H6926><s%> of Assyria. <S%H804><s%> The fourth <S%H7243><s%> river <S%H5104><s%> is the Euphrates. <S%H6578><s%>

Yahweh <S%H3068><s%> God <S%H430><s%> took <S%H3947><s%> the man, <S%H120><s%> and put him <S%H3240><s%> into the garden <S%H1588><s%> of Eden <S%H5731><s%> to dress <S%H5647><s%> it and to keep it. <S%H8104><s%>

Yahweh <S%H3068><s%> God <S%H430><s%> commanded <S%H6680><s%> the man, <S%H120><s%> saying, <S%H559><s%> "Of every tree <S%H6086><s%> of the garden <S%H1588><s%> you may freely <S%H398><s%> eat; <S%H398><s%>

but of the tree <S%H6086><s%> of the knowledge <S%H1847><s%> of good <S%H2896><s%> and evil, <S%H7451><s%> you shall not eat <S%H398><s%> of it; <S%H3117><s%> for in the day that you eat <S%H398><s%> of it you will surely <S%H4191><s%> die. <S%H4191><s%>"

Yahweh <S%H3068><s%> God <S%H430><s%> said, <S%H559><s%> "It is not good <S%H2896><s%> that the man <S%H120><s%> should be <S%H1961><s%> alone; <S%H6213><s%> I will make him a helper suitable for him. <S%H5828><s%>"

Out of the ground <S%H127><s%> Yahweh <S%H3068><s%> God <S%H430><s%> formed <S%H3335><s%> every animal <S%H2416><s%> of the field, <S%H7704><s%> and every bird <S%H5775><s%> of the sky, <S%H8064><s%> and brought <S%H935><s%> them to the man <S%H120><s%> to see <S%H7200><s%> what he would call <S%H7121><s%> them. <S%H120><s%> Whatever the man called <S%H7121><s%> every living <S%H2416><s%> creature, <S%H5315><s%> that <S%H1931><s%> was its name. <S%H8034><s%>

The man <S%H120><s%> gave <S%H7121><s%> names <S%H8034><s%> to all livestock, <S%H929><s%> and to the birds <S%H5775><s%> of the sky, <S%H8064><s%> and to every animal <S%H2416><s%> of the field; <S%H7704><s%> but for man <S%H120><s%> there was not found <S%H4672><s%> a helper suitable for him. <S%H5828><s%>

Yahweh <S%H3068><s%> God <S%H430><s%> caused <S%H5307><s%> a deep sleep <S%H8639><s%> to fall <S%H5307><s%> on the man, <S%H121><s%> and he slept; <S%H3462><s%> and he took <S%H3947><s%> one <S%H259><s%> of his ribs, <S%H6763><s%> and closed up <S%H5462><s%> the flesh in its place. <S%H1320><s%>

He made <S%H1129><s%> the rib, <S%H6763><s%> which Yahweh <S%H3068><s%> God <S%H430><s%> had taken <S%H3947><s%> from the man, <S%H120><s%> into a woman, <S%H802><s%> and brought <S%H935><s%> her to the man. <S%H120><s%>

The man <S%H120><s%> said, <S%H559><s%> "This <S%H2063><s%> is now <S%H6471><s%> bone <S%H6106><s%> of my bones, <S%H6106><s%> and flesh <S%H1320><s%> of my flesh. <S%H1320><s%> She <S%H2063><s%> will be called <S%H7121><s%> <S%H99999><s%> 'woman,' because she <S%H2063><s%> was taken <S%H3947><s%> out of Man. <S%H376><s%>"

Therefore <S%H3651><s%> a man <S%H376><s%> will leave <S%H5800><s%> his father <S%H1><s%> and his mother, <S%H517><s%> and will join <S%H1692><s%> with his wife, <S%H802><s%> and they will be one <S%H259><s%> flesh. <S%H1320><s%>
They were both <S%H8147><s%> naked, <S%H6174><s%> the man <S%H120><s%> and his wife, <S%H802><s%> and were not ashamed. <S%H954><s%>
